description.value:
End Effect: At the end of each of their turns, the olothec can take [[/damage 10]]{10 damage} to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

Solo Turns: The olothec can take two turns each round. They can't take turns consecutively.

A creature permanently devolves into a [[/apply uBQLDGNoZMc0EYaE]] if they spend 1 continuous minute weakened by Devolving Tentacles, they are reduced to 0 Stamina by the psychic damage from Devolving Tentacles, or they suffer all three transformations from Oozing Transformation.

effects.name: Slive Servant
effects.description:
Slime servants are creatures who have been changed through the powers of the olothec. Their flesh devolves into a translucent primordial state, and they lose their memories and sense of self, becoming a slime servant NPC who is loyal to the olothec. The slime servant retains all their original statistics and gains the following traits:

  • Being of the Deep. The slime servant can breathe air and water.Additionally, they can automatically swim at full speed while moving

  • Dulled Mind. The slime servant can’t be frightened or taunted.

  • Servant Senses. The olothec can sense anything the slime servantsenses, and if the slime servant can speak, the olothec canspeak through their body.

Only technology from the upper worlds, particularly products of evolutionary advancements made by the voiceless talkers, can restore a slime servant’s memories and return them to their original state.

description.value: The olothec can't be made frightened or taunted.
A slimed or transformed creature can't have concealment from or be hidden from the olothec.

tier1.display: {{potency}} weakened or the target is slimed (save ends)

tier3.display: {{potency}} weakened and the target is slimed (save ends)

effect.after: A slimed target takes 4 psychic damage whenever they make a power roll.

effects.name: Slimed
effects.description: A slimed target takes [[/damage 4 psychic]]{4 psychic damage} whenever they make a power roll.

effects.name: Weakened and Slimed
effects.description: You are weakened and take [[/damage 4 psychic]]{4 psychic damage} whenever you make a power roll.

target.custom: Each creature and object in the area

effect.after: Each creature pushed this way is pushed to an unoccupied space in the area as far as possible from the olothec.

spend.text: The area is difficult terrain. Any creature who enters the area or moves within it for the first time on a turn and has A < 3 is knocked prone.

effect.after:
Each time a target is transformed, the Director chooses one of the following transformations. When a target ends the transformed effect, all transformations on them end.

Head: The target's head becomes a ball of slime. They can't communicate and have line of effect only within 3 squares.

Legs: The target's legs become pillars of ooze. They are slowed while on land and can automatically swim at full speed while moving.

Torso: The target's arms become gelatinous. They can't benefit from edges or double edges and can't gain or use surges.

effects.name: Transformed (head)
effects.description: Your head becomes a ball of slime. You can’t communicate and have line of effect only within 3 squares.

effects.name: Tranformed (legs)
effects.description: Your legs become pillars of ooze. You are slowed while on land and can automatically swim at full speed while moving.

effects.name: Transformed (torso)
effects.description: Your arms become gelatinous. You can’t benefit from edges or double edges and can’t gain or use surges.

effect.after: The olothec teleports to an unoccupied space within 10 squares. Alternatively, they swap places with a creature or object within 5 squares of them.

effect.before: The target takes [[/damage 8 psychic]]{8 psychic damage} and has psychic weakness 3 until the end of the olothec's next turn.

system.trigger: An enemy within distance deals damage to the olothec.

effect.after: While frightened this way, a target can't make saving throws to end any other effects

effect.before: The olothec slides each target up to 5 squares. Each target takes [[/damage 12 psychic]]{12 psychic damage}, and if they have [[potency M 3]] they are [[/apply aZfQ1bJDhcOoegXb save]]{weakened and slimed} (save ends). A slimed target takes [[/damage 4 psychic]]{4 psychic damage} whenever they make a power roll. Additionally, until the start of their next turn, the olothec has [[/apply pCE8TT0vZmNECwM4 turn]]{damage immunity 4.}

effects.name: Weakened and Slimed
effects.description: You are weakened and take [[/damage 4 psychic]]{4 psychic damage} whenever you make a power roll.

effect.after: A devolved creature has a −1 score for all their characteristics other than Reason.

effects.name: Devolved
effects.description: A devolved creature has a −1 score for all their characteristics other than Reason.

effect.before: The olothec takes an additional main action on their turn. They can use this feature even if they are dazed.

target.custom: One slimed, transformed, or devolved creature

effect.after: The olothec can pull a target grabbed this way adjacent to them. While grabbed this way, a target can’t make saving throws to end any other effects, and the olothec has a double edge on strikes against them.

effect.before: The olothec broadcasts their memory of the universe in its pri mordial state—a sweeping cacophony of transcendental irration ality and unceasing change. Until the end of the encounter, any creature who starts their turn within 3 squares of the olothec and has [[potency R 3]] is [[/apply XV3JUcixv5fgbYm7 turn]]{dazed and slowed} until the end of their next turn.
